title: Your Glow Lights My Way
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

stay there, i'll catch up
i like to imagine the things we'll discuss
don't wait for me, you'll grow bored
you'll see me in a bit

the noise

i can pull myself from the static more and more
i can think of me and see myself clearly in my minds eye
i can feel shape
are you excited?

the noise

i'll be there soon, i just need to catch my breath
i ache but i move
are you that feeling up my spine?
i can't get you off of my mind either

the noise 

can you hear me now?
it hurts to speak
but you'll see me soon
your glow lights my way

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

 the silence

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: Savvoi
